plot outline: Gunjan loves to spend time with his best friend Krish and has neglected his love life all this while. What happens when Krish meets Barsha and falls in love with her? Will things be the same between Krish and Gunjan now? With unpredictable twists and turns, the film progresses to be an outright laughter riot.
title: Jamai Badal
plot: Gunjan loves to spend time with his best friend Krish and has neglected his love life all this while. What happens when Krish meets Barsha and falls in love with her? Will things be the same between Krish and Gunjan now? With unpredictable twists and turns, the film progresses to be an outright laughter riot.
